text:
Hi!
Is it possible to have custom variables in rich text as well as in custom modules?

We have a piece of text that is repeated in a lot of places and that is updated monthly and on multiple language versions :sweat_smile:

So ideally we would like to use a variable from hub db or something like that.

Been thinking of macros to scan the text and replace a variable name, but a built in solution would be nicer ^_^
Is there any way to get email of logged user in hubl?

Custom deal property for a quotes template - I'm trying to get the value of the properties options, have used a CRM property field with the code 'module.modulename.property_definition.label' how do I get the modules options value? 
Also the label value won't show in the template saying error "Deal objects can only be retrieved on membership or password restricted pages" can I get around this?
